roleset.name: deceive, betray
roleset.note: DOUBLECROSS-V NOTES: Same as double-cross.01 (from doublecross.01-v)

example.text: One former bailiff charged that the judge double - crossed him by reneging on a promise of a better paying job after pocketing a $ 500 bribe .
example.arg: by reneging on a promise of a better paying job after pocketing a $ 500 bribe
